Class Family

java.lang.Object
Family
public class Family
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents and stores properties of a Family (Arrangment of Children and Adults).
Since:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int filingStatus  
    private int numMembers  
    private Person[] people  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Family​(int members, int filingStatus)
    This initializes a new Family, creating an assortment of Adults and Children

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addMember​(Person p)
    Adds a new member to the assortment of family members
    float calculateTax()
    Calculates the total tax of a family based on their income ranges and their corresponding tax rates.
    int getFilingStatus()
    Gets the filing status in a given family
    int getNumAdults()
    Gets how many adults are in a given family
    int getNumChildren()
    Gets how many children are in a given family
    Person[] getPeople()
    Gets the assortment of people in a family
    float getTaxableIncome()
    Calculates the total taxable income of all family members, subtracting deductions for each member.
    private float preTaxCredit()  
    float taxCredit()
    Calculates the tax credit that applies to a given family based on their financial situation/children.

    • numMembers

      private final int numMembers

    • filingStatus

      private final int filingStatus

      private final Person[] people

  • Constructor Details

    • Family

      public Family​(int members, int filingStatus)
      This initializes a new Family, creating an assortment of Adults and Children
      Parameters:
      members - Represents the amount of people in a family
      filingStatus - Represents a family's status when filing taxes. 1 = single, 2 = married filing jointly, 3 = married filing separate.

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public boolean addMember​(Person p)
      Adds a new member to the assortment of family members
      Parameters:
      p - Person to be added to the assortment, if the family has space.
      Returns:
      returns true if adding the given person is successful, false otherwise.

    • getNumAdults

      public int getNumAdults()
      Gets how many adults are in a given family
      Returns:
      returns the number of adults in a family.

    • getNumChildren

      public int getNumChildren()
      Gets how many children are in a given family
      Returns:
      returns the number of children in a family.

    • getFilingStatus

      public int getFilingStatus()
      Gets the filing status in a given family
      Returns:
      returns the filing status based on the family's current situation. 1 = single, 2 = married filing jointly, 3 = married filing separate.

    • getTaxableIncome

      public float getTaxableIncome()
      Calculates the total taxable income of all family members, subtracting deductions for each member.
      Returns:
      returns the taxable income of the entire family.

    • preTaxCredit

      private float preTaxCredit()

    • taxCredit

      public float taxCredit()
      Calculates the tax credit that applies to a given family based on their financial situation/children.
      Returns:
      returns the tax credit that a family applies for.

    • calculateTax

      public float calculateTax()
      Calculates the total tax of a family based on their income ranges and their corresponding tax rates.
      Returns:
      returns the total tax of a family based on income ranges/rates.

    • getPeople

      public Person[] getPeople()
      Gets the assortment of people in a family
      Returns:
      returns the array of people in a given family.
